Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.event.gameEvents.match

Class CV_CommandRequestEvent

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.event.gameEvents.GameEvent
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.event.gameEvents.ViewGameEvent
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.event.gameEvents.match.CV_CommandRequestEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CV_CommandRequestEvent
extends ViewGameEvent
Event sent by the Controller to the client when the server expect a command from the user. It contains the available actions for this user and all the possible movements and build for both the worker A and B.
See Also:
